creditline: Bequest of Mr. William E. Goodfellow
description: Rug, Gorevan type, large, with cream field carrying a large rose-red medallion adorned with an elaborate angular floral and vine pattern in blue, yellow, pink, brown and green. Corners of the field are rose-red. Three borders, one wide with tortoise pattern on rose-red ground and two narrow with a pattern of single rosettes on a cream ground. Sides overcast with pinkish red wool; ends finished with very short fringe of warp threads. Cotton warp and woof. Senna knot.
title: Rug
